rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample natural light and Vastu-compliant placement for auspicious entry.
spacious living room designed to connect with the central courtyard for enhanced ventilation and eco-friendly design. Incorporates large windows and a Vastu-aligned layout.
Energy-efficient kitchen with integrated smart appliances, natural lighting from adjoining courtyard, and waste management systems in place.
Dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for family interactions with eco-friendly furniture options.
Master bedroom optimized for privacy and natural light. Vastu aligned placement to ensure positive energy flow. Includes built-in storage and sustainable materials.
Second bedroom designed with eco-friendly insulation and ample space for relaxation, following Vastu principles.
Primary bathroom with water-saving fixtures and natural ventilation to reduce moisture.
Secondary bathroom for guest or service use, incorporating eco-friendly features.
Entertainment area with soundproofing and energy-efficient LED lighting. Designed to provide an immersive viewing experience while maintaining eco-friendly practices.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with sustainable materials and energy-efficient sealing.
Large windows to maximize natural light in the living room, promoting a healthy indoor environment.
Window openings facilitating direct view and access to the central courtyard for enhanced ventilation.

garage.description: Dual-car garage with eco-friendly design elements such as natural lighting through skylights and proper insulation.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard promoting air circulation, natural light, and a peaceful retreat. landscaped with drought-resistant plants in line with eco-friendly principles.
